string.text: Is everything okay?

Hey, Marked One! Thanks for your help against those fucking fanatics! Look, I want to offer you something in return... If you ever feel like using one of our suits, I can upgrade it for you. I can reinforce it to make it more durable, and even add Pilot Night Vision. How does that sound?
It sounds superb. I'm honored. Thank you...
Could you upgrade a suit for me, please?

I can install PNV onto any of these suits for you:
The 'Wind of Freedom' suit
The 'Guards of Freedom' suit
The Freedom SEVA suit
The Freedom Exoskeleton
The Unique 'Wind of Freedom' suit
The 'Wind of Freedom' suit with gas mask
The 'Guards of Freedom' suit with gas mask
The Unique Freedom Exoskeleton
The Unique Military 'Cobblestone' armor
I can also reinforce any of these suits with light titanium plates, making it do its job for longer before you need to repair it. The plates I use are pre-formed specially for Freedom's suits by a fabricating company. They supply different patterns to order, so if you want another faction's suit modified, you'll need to talk with their technicians instead, okay? So what would you like?
Night vision, please...
Do you want it installed on a standard suit, or a reinforced one?
On a standard suit...
No problem... Onto which suit would you like it fitted?
The 'Wind of Freedom' suit...
The 'Guards of Freedom' suit...
The Freedom SEVA suit...
The Freedom Exoskeleton...
The Unique 'Wind of Freedom' suit...
The 'Wind of Freedom' suit with gas mask...
The 'Guards of Freedom' suit with gas mask...
The Unique Freedom Exoskeleton...
The Unique Military 'Cobblestone' armor...

Hi, Marked One! Well, I see you're serious - The Barman has informed me that you have the Agroprom documents. Good man! I'd be happy to offer my services in updating the heaviest but most sought after suits in the Zone - Exoskeletons. Specifically, I can install Pilot Night Vision and reinforcing plates, that will make your suit last longer. Unfortunately, each faction's technician works differently, modifying to what their group needs, using what they have available. In addition, they use differently formed plates, so I can't promise to modify every Exoskeleton. I can help with Loner and Bandit Exoskeletons - I do all their modifications - but Duty Exoskeletons can be modified by their ex-sniper Petrenko. You'll just need to come to an arrangement with the security detail at their base entrance...
Excellent, thanks!
Can you update suits?
